channel.title: Parnian Lali - ctf
channel.description: Hey, I'm Parnian - AI developer, researcher and I have a great passion for learning new things.

item.title: KalmarCTF 2025 Write-up: nix-build as a service
item.author: Diogo Correia
item.description: This is a write-up of the “nix-build as a service” challenge from KalmarCTF 2025, a sequel to last year’s “Reproducible Pwning” challenge. To get to the solution, we will take a peek behind the curtain into how Nix derivations work internally.

item.title: openECSC 2024 Round 2 Write-up: GoSweeper
item.author: Diogo Correia
item.description: This is a write-up of the “GoSweeper” challenge from Round 2 of openECSC 2024. This challenge gives us a glimpse of side channels on the web, which allow us to infer information which we otherwise would not have access to.

item.title: KalmarCTF 2024 Write-up: Reproducible Pwning
item.author: Diogo Correia
item.description: This is a write-up of the “Reproducible Pwning” challenge from KalmarCTF 2024. This challenge takes us through the inner workings of Nix and a very interesting privilege escalation that has made me change my own NixOS configuration.
